# [Interview #690: Twitter: Brandonothology collection, Entry #57](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=690#57)

#### JasonMichelsen

What music have you been listening to while writing
*A Memory of Light*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Daft Punk, George Winston, Will Ackerman, OC Remix, Enya, Fotheringham, and Metallica. Among others.
